# [Interview #1046: WOR Signing Report - Nicrosil, Entry #6](https://www.theoryland.com/intvmain.php?i=1046#6)

#### Nicrosil

Will we ever see more of Stick?

#### Brandon Sanderson

\*Laughs\* Everyone loves Stick. But no, there aren't any plans to have more Stick.
